name: Think Derp
description:
Local Multiplayer! Steve Jobs vs Developer!

DESCRIPTION:

Think Derp is an action brawler, try to knock your opponent off of the building using the office equipment that drops from the sky. Whoever knocks the other player off three times first wins!

CONTROLS:

Hold down C for player 1 or Right-Shift for player 2 and run into the office equipment to pick it up.

Use WSAD for player 1 or The Arrow Keys for player 2 to move around.

This game was made in 48Hours by Ian Loh, Bryan Loh, and Alistair St Pierre.
